[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” content_placement=”middle” css=”.vc_custom_1603184409272{padding-top: 260px !important;padding-bottom: 200px !important;background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/mnb-1.jpg?id=8483) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” top_section_title=”” bottom_section_title=””][vc_column css=”.vc_custom_1513003956648{padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″ css=”.vc_custom_1513004658055{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”2/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1513008591637{padding-right: 0px !important;padding-left: 0px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Mehandi Ceremony” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:70|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Great%20Vibes%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/6″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” kd_fixed_background=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602921700676{background: #ffffff url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/09/blue-white-bokeh-background-vector-6344567.jpg?id=7741) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Mehandi Ceremony” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:70|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

In any wedding, Mehandi is the most awaited ceremony for family members, especially the female members. They have different wishes when we talk about this ceremony. The female members want to celebrate this ceremony with amazing mehndi designs, a lot of entertainment, Amazing Games, Delicious Food and beautiful photography to capture the memory.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8456″ img_size=”450*450″ alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_rounded” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][vc_empty_space][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1602921553783{background-image: url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/14396-white-background-design.jpg?id=7969) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”8458″ img_size=”400*400″ style=”vc_box_border_circle” border_color=”black” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInLeft”][vc_empty_space height=”60px”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_custom_heading text=”Why Archi Events ?” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:70|text_align:left” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInRight”]

Archi Events completely understands the feelings, emotions that family has for Haldi Ceremony. The female director of Archi Events with her expert team converts that ordinary Mehandi function into a festive occasion that is unforgettable. Amazing Décor, High-Quality Self Made Mehandi, Beautifully crafted custom designs and Multiple entertainment programs and that too under personal Supervision are the essential elements to convert a Mehandi program into a unique one.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”middle” kd_fixed_background=”true” kd_image_overlay=”true” css=”.vc_custom_1603179903384{background: #ffffff url(https://archievents.in/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/depositphotos_65305285-stock-photo-white-hexagon-wall-background-simple.jpg?id=8316) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Services We Provide” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:60|text_align:left|color:%230a0a0a” google_fonts=”font_family:Lobster%3Aregular|font_style:400%20regular%3A400%3Anormal” css_animation=”fadeInUp”][vc_column_text css_animation=”fadeInLeft”]

  • Theme Based Decoration
  • Selfie Photo Booth
  • Mehandi Artist
  • Live Guest Entertainment
  • Catering
  • Venue Selection
  • Many More Services…………

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_empty_space height=”90px”][vc_single_image image=”8457″ img_size=”full” alignment=”right” style=”vc_box_shadow_3d” onclick=”link_image” css_animation=”fadeInRight”][vc_empty_space height=”64px”][/vc_column][/vc_row]
